info.title: Pims

get.summary: Find all categories

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Find only the categories whose label/short label contains this value.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the categories which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show all categories.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the categories in the corresponding order.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language used for the translatable labels.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of categories

get.summary: Get one category by ID

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted category.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language used for the translatable labels.

200.description: Successful operation, gives one category

get.summary: Find all channels

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Find only the channels whose label contains this value.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the channels which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show all channels.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the channels in the corresponding order.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language used for the translatable labels.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of channels

get.summary: Get one channel by ID

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted channel.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language used for the translatable labels.

200.description: Successful operation, gives one channel

get.summary: Find all events

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Find only the events whose label contains this value.

parameters.name: from_datetime
parameters.description: Find only the events starting after this date.

parameters.name: to_datetime
parameters.description: Find only the events starting before this date.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Find only the events whose venue city (or metropolitan area) contains this value.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the events in the corresponding order.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language used for the translatable labels.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of events

get.summary: Get one event by ID

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language used for the translatable labels.

200.description: Successful operation, gives one event

get.summary: Find all capacities for one event

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]categories which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the capacities in the corresponding order.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of events capacities

get.summary: Get one capacity by ID

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: capacity_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted capacity.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]categories which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

200.description: Successful operation, gives one event capacity

get.summary: Find all categories for one event

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]categories/[event-]price ranges which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of events categories

get.summary: Get one event category by ID

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event category.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the embedded [event-]price ranges which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

200.description: Successful operation, gives one event category

get.summary: Find all channels for one event

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]channels which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of events channels

get.summary: Get one event channel by ID

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event channel.

200.description: Successful operation, gives one event channel

get.summary: Find all promotions for one event

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Find only the promotions whose label contains this value.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Find only the promotions starting after this date.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Find only the promotions ending before this date.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Find only the promotions whose type is equal to this value.

parameters.name: family
parameters.description: Find only the promotions whose family is equal to this value.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the promotions in the corresponding order.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language used for the translatable labels.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of promotions

get.summary: Find all ticket counts for one event

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Find only the ticket counts after this date.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Find only the ticket counts before this date.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]categories/[event-]price ranges/[event]channels which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

parameters.name: show_not_approved
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the approved ticket counts. If set to `true`, show all the ticket counts.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the ticket counts in the corresponding order.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of ticket counts

get.summary: Find all detailed ticket counts for one event

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Find only the ticket counts after this date.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Find only the ticket counts before this date.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]categories/[event-]price ranges/[event]channels which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

parameters.name: show_not_approved
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the approved ticket counts. If set to `true`, show all the ticket counts.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the ticket counts in the corresponding order.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of detailed ticket counts

get.summary: Get one detailed ticket count by ID

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted event.

parameters.name: ticket_count_id
parameters.description: ID of the targeted ticket count.

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]categories/[event-]price ranges/[event]channels which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

200.description: Successful operation, gives one detailed ticket count

get.summary: Get one ticket count by ID

parameters.name: event_id

parameters.name: ticket_count_id

parameters.name: show_ignored
parameters.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]categories/[event-]price ranges/[event]channels which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

200.description: Successful operation, gives one ticket count

get.summary: Find all events for one venue

parameters.name: from_datetime
parameters.description: Find only the events starting after this date.

parameters.name: to_datetime

parameters.name: city

parameters.description: Language used for the translatable labels.

200.description: Successful operation, gives an array of events

ignored.description: Defines whether this category is ignored or not.

last_update_timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the category was last updated in the customer's database.

short_label.description: Short label of the category (generally less than 5 characters).

ignored.description: Defines whether this channel is ignored or not.

last_update_timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the channel was last updated in the customer's database.

short_label.description: Short label of the channel (generally less than 5 characters).

title.description: Message corresponding to the status code.

type.description: Link to RFC 2616 about status codes definitions.

title.description: Message corresponding to the status code.

type.description: Link to RFC 2616 about status codes definitions.

title.description: Message corresponding to the status code.

type.description: Link to RFC 2616 about status codes definitions.

title.description: Message corresponding to the status code.

type.description: Link to RFC 2616 about status codes definitions.

title.description: Message corresponding to the status code.

type.description: Link to RFC 2616 about status codes definitions.

date.description: Date from which the capacity is active.

event_categories.description: Array of categories with their detailed capacities.

comps.description: Number of comps in the category.

holds.description: Number of *holds* in the category. Holds are seats/places that are not in sale at the date of the capacity, but will eventually be later.

id.description: Unique ID of the event category.

kills.description: Number of *kills* in the category. Kills are seats/places that will not be sold for technical reasons.

sellable_capacity.description: Number of sellable seats/places in the category. This is calculated by the formula: `total_capacity - kills - comps - holds`.

total_capacity.description: Total number of seats/places in the category.

id.description: Unique ID of the event capacity.

base_price.description: Base price of the event price range (i.e. including VAT but excluding all commissions).

id.description: ID of the event price range.

ignored.description: Defines whether this event price range is ignored or not.

public_price.description: Public price of the event price range (i.e. including VAT and all commissions).

id.description: Unique ID of the event category.

ignored.description: Defines whether this event category is ignored or not.

id.description: Unique ID of the event channel.

ignored.description: Defines whether this event channel is ignored or not.

break_even.description: Value of the break-even for the event.

id.description: Unique ID identifying the contract partner.

label.description: Label of the contract type. This value is translated according to the 'Accept-Language' header.

creation_timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the venue was created in the customer's database.

datetime.description: Datetime of the event (relative to the timezone of the venue).

free.description: Whether this event is free or not.

general_sales_date.description: Date the event went on general sales (relative to the timezone of the venue).

id.description: String identifying the input type of the event.

label.description: Label of the input type. This value is translated according to the 'Accept-Language' header.

last_update_timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the venue was last updated in the customer's database.

max_capacity.description: Maximum capacity for the venue in which the event occurs.

presales_date.description: Date the event went on presales (relative to the timezone of the venue).

series_id.description: ID of the series the event belongs to.

sold_out_date.description: Date the event was sold out.

id.description: Unique ID of the price range.

ignored.description: Defines whether this price range is ignored or not.

label.description: Full label of the price range.

last_update_timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the price range was last updated in the customer's database.

short_label.description: Short label of the price range (generally less than 5 characters).

applied_to.description: List of events and/or series where the promotion is applied. A promotion can be applied on several events, and its costs can be split between those events.

event_id.description: ID of the event the promotion applies to. This property is exclusive with 'series_id': if defined, then 'series_id' will not be displayed.

quantity.description: Quantity share of the promotion devoted to this event/series.

series_id.description: ID of the series the promotion applies to. This property is exclusive with 'event_id': if defined, then 'event_id' will not be displayed.

unit_cost.description: Unit cost share of the promotion devoted to this event/series. The total cost of the share can be calculated with: quantity × unit_cost. *This field may be omitted according to the customer configuration.*

valorized_quantity.description: Valorized quantity share of the promotion devoted to this event/series. *This field may be omitted according to the customer configuration.*

valorized_unit_cost.description: Valorized unit cost share of the promotion devoted to this event/series. The total valorized cost of the share can be calculated with: valorized_quantity × valorized_unit_cost.

currency.description: Currency of the unit_cost (ISO 4212 alphabetic code).

exchange.description: What was offered in exchange of the promotion.

id.description: String identifying the state of the promotion cost.

label.description: Label of the state of the promotion cost. This value is translated according to the 'Accept-Language' header.

state.description: State of the promotion cost. *This object may be omitted according to the customer configuration.*

id.description: String identifying the type of the promotion cost.

label.description: Label of the type of the promotion cost. This value is translated according to the 'Accept-Language' header.

unit_cost.description: Unit cost of the promotion. The total cost of the promotion can be calculated with: quantity × unit_cost.

valorized_quantity.description: Valorized quantity of the promotion (see valorized_unit_cost). *This field may be omitted according to the customer configuration.*

valorized_unit_cost.description: Valorized unit cost of the promotion. The total valorized cost of the promotion can be calculated with: valorized_quantity × valorized_unit_cost. *This field may be omitted according to the customer configuration.*

end_date.description: Date the promotion ends. (If null, has the same value as start_date.)

label.description: Label of the promotion family. This value is translated according to the 'Accept-Language' header.

family.description: Family the promotion type belongs to.

label.description: Label of the promotion type. This value is translated according to the 'Accept-Language' header.

id.description: Unique ID identifying the contract partner.

label.description: Label of the contract type. This value is translated according to the 'Accept-Language' header.

creation_timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the series was created in the customer's database.

first_date.description: Date of the first event in the series.

last_date.description: Date of the last event in the series.

last_update_timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the series was last updated in the customer's database.

label.description: Label of the series type. This value is translated according to the 'Accept-Language' header.

approved.description: Defines whether this ticket count is approved or not.

event_channels.description: Array of event channels where the sales were made.

event_categories.description: Array of event categories which where sold.

event_price_ranges.description: Array of event price ranges which where sold.

currency.description: Currency of the gross (ISO 4212 alphabetic code).

gross.description: Gross (= income for the sold tickets for the current channel/category/price range, including VAT but excluding all commissions).

id.description: ID of the event price range.

reservations.description: Detailed ticket reservations (= number of reserved tickets for the current channel/category/price range). *This field may be omitted according to the customer configuration.*

sales.description: Detailed ticket sales (= number of sold tickets for the current channel/category/price range).

final.description: Whether this ticket count is the last and final one of its event or not. If it is, it means that no further ticket counts will be added for the event it belongs to.

id.description: Unique ID of the ticket count.

approved.description: Defines whether this ticket count is approved or not.

currency.description: Currency of the gross (ISO 4212 alphabetic code).

final.description: Whether this ticket count is the last and final one of its event or not. If it is, it means that no further ticket counts will be added for the event it belongs to.

gross.description: Gross (= income for the sold tickets, including VAT but excluding all commissions).

id.description: Unique ID of the ticket count.

reservations.description: Ticket reservations (= number of reserved tickets). *This field may be omitted according to the customer configuration.*

sales.description: Ticket sales (= number of sold tickets).

alternative_labels.description: Array of alternative/old names of the venue.

city.description: City in which the venue is.

country_code.description: Country in which the venue is (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code).

creation_timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the venue was created in the customer's database.

first_address.description: First address field of the venue.

last_update_timestamp.description: Timestamp for when the venue was last updated in the customer's database.

major_city.description: Major city or metropolitan area the venue belongs to.

second_address.description: Second address field of the venue.

label.description: Label of the venue type. This value is translated according to the 'Accept-Language' header.

200-events.description: Successful operation, gives an array of events

200-promotions.description: Successful operation, gives an array of promotions

header_Accept-Language.name: Accept-Language
header_Accept-Language.description: Language used for the translatable labels.

query_capacities_show-ignored.name: show_ignored
query_capacities_show-ignored.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]categories which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

query_events_city.name: city
query_events_city.description: Find only the events whose venue city (or metropolitan area) contains this value.

query_events_from-datetime.name: from_datetime
query_events_from-datetime.description: Find only the events starting after this date.

query_events_label.name: label
query_events_label.description: Find only the events whose label contains this value.

query_events_sort.name: sort
query_events_sort.description: Sort the events in the corresponding order.

query_events_to-datetime.name: to_datetime
query_events_to-datetime.description: Find only the events starting before this date.

query_page-size.name: page_size
query_page-size.description: Pagination size, i.e. maximum number of items to be displayed in the response.

query_promotions_family.name: family
query_promotions_family.description: Find only the promotions whose family is equal to this value.

query_promotions_from-date.name: from_date
query_promotions_from-date.description: Find only the promotions starting after this date.

query_promotions_label.name: label
query_promotions_label.description: Find only the promotions whose label contains this value.

query_promotions_sort.name: sort
query_promotions_sort.description: Sort the promotions in the corresponding order.

query_promotions_to-date.name: to_date
query_promotions_to-date.description: Find only the promotions ending before this date.

query_promotions_type.name: type
query_promotions_type.description: Find only the promotions whose type is equal to this value.

query_ticket-counts_from-date.name: from_date
query_ticket-counts_from-date.description: Find only the ticket counts after this date.

query_ticket-counts_show-ignored.name: show_ignored
query_ticket-counts_show-ignored.description: If set to `false`, show only the [event-]categories/[event-]price ranges/[event]channels which are not ignored. If set to `true`, show everything.

query_ticket-counts_show-not-approved.name: show_not_approved
query_ticket-counts_show-not-approved.description: If set to `false`, show only the approved ticket counts. If set to `true`, show all the ticket counts.

query_ticket-counts_sort.name: sort
query_ticket-counts_sort.description: Sort the ticket counts in the corresponding order.

query_ticket-counts_to-date.name: to_date
query_ticket-counts_to-date.description: Find only the ticket counts before this date.
